attributes.description: IN TRANSIT!!!! - The very sleek 2011 Mercedes-Benz CLS 63 AMG is on it's way. This vehicle has a mix of sweeping curves and bold creases and even more muscle. LED headlamps and a rear spoiler, more defined creases on its bonnet, entirely different front and rear bumpers and sporty side skirts. The interior is as stylish as the exterior with expensive materials and supportive seats. The boot is very spacious for all the necessary baggage. The 63 AMG comes with great standard safety measures including Attention Assist and active head restraints.  The Mercedes CLS feels solidly built, handles the road extremely well with its power steering and is a very comfortable drive. With a full Dekra condition and roadworthy report, this is a must Test Drive vehicle. The price does not include dealership fees and smash and grab. More images to follow.
